content: Craft a story about a mischievous cat using exactly 100 words.

Once upon a time, in a quaint little village, there lived a mischievous cat named Whiskers. With his agile body and curious nature, he was always up to some trouble. One sunny afternoon, Whiskers spotted a group of birds perched on a fence. Determined to catch one, he silently crept towards them. Just as he pounced, the birds flew away, chirping in laughter. Whiskers, undeterred, decided to try again. This time, he climbed a tree and jumped from branch to branch, trying to get closer. But the birds were too quick for him. Frustrated, Whiskers finally gave up and settled for a nice nap in the warm sun, already planning his next adventure.
